short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lets you watch any kind of video with friends.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Yo!
Isn't it awesome to have your favourite video player ready for you on every web page containing a video? If you think so, then you would love some features and costumization as a bonus 😉
JSt also offers you opportunity to watch any kind of video with friends: just connect to same room and enjoy simultaneous stuff 🍿
You will certainly appreciate faster videos (as JSt can go up to 16x speed) and manage to free up some time 😆
Last but not least, customize every kind of color to get yourself comfortable with the player using

* added emoji chat 😀 to share experiences while watching
